General.Name: Swire Properties Limited
General.Description: Swire Properties Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops, owns, and operates mixed-use, primarily commercial properties in Hong Kong, Mainland China, the United States, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Property Investment, Property Trading, and Hotels. The company is involved in the development, leasing, and management of commercial, retail, and residential properties; the development, construction, and sale of residential apartments; and operation of hotels. It also provides landscaping, financial, and real estate agency services. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Hong Kong, Hong Kong. Swire Properties Limited is a subsidiary of Swire Pacific Limited.
